meanings.definition: Moving quickly or with great speed.
meanings.sent2: The car drove fast down the highway.
meanings.sent3: The fast cheetah easily caught its prey.
meanings.sent4: Time flies fast when you're having fun.
meanings.sent5: The fast train zoomed past the station.
meanings.sent6: Fast cars are exciting to watch at the race.
meanings.sent7: The fast rabbit won the race against the turtle.

meanings.sent2: The fasteners held the pieces together tightly.
meanings.sent3: The fast magnet attracted all the metal objects.
meanings.sent4: The fast friendship between them never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The fastened belt kept him safe in the car.
meanings.sent6: The fastened lock secured the door tightly.
meanings.sent7: The fastened rope held the boat in place.

meanings.sent1: She decided to fast for religious reasons.
meanings.sent2: He needed to fast before the medical procedure.
meanings.sent3: The kids thought it was fun to fast for a day.
meanings.sent4: They chose to fast to show solidarity with those in need.
meanings.sent5: The doctor advised him to fast before the blood test.
meanings.sent6: They planned to fast together for charity.
meanings.sent7: She felt refreshed after the fast was over.
